title: Teacher Capacity-Building Program Utilizing Mixed-Reality Digital Puppeteering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and general classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Process for in-service teachers to practice diverse classroom scenarios and receive feedback while interacting with virtual students in mixed reality environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more strategies to communicate effectively with diverse student types (language, cultural backgrounds, etc.) in a mixed-reality simulation environment.
Learners can adjust virtual students' responses in real-time using digital puppeteering technology and design five or more situational response plans.
Learners can derive two or more pedagogical approaches applicable to real classrooms through three or more PBL-developed virtual classroom scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
